mapper.select: SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO, USER_NAME, TITLE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN CRJ WHERE CRJ.CHAT_ROOM_NO = CR.CHAT_ROOM_NO) CNT FROM CHAT_ROOM CR JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE CR.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CHAT_ROOM_NO DESC
SELECT MESSAGE, USER_NAME, USER_NO, CM_NO, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE FROM CHAT_MESSAGE JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{chatRoomNo} ORDER BY CM_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MESSAGE VALUES( SEQ_CM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{message}, SYSDATE, #{chatRoomNo}, #{userNo} )
